issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hello,

BlackBerry Z 10 & Z30 splash screens is 728*1280 , Q10 & Q5 is 720*720
http://developer.blackberry.com/devzone/design/bb10/screen_sizes.html

All we need to replace splashScreens tag with this one
{code:title=/Users/hazemkhaled/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.3.0.v20140211145441/blackberry/templates/bar-descriptor2.xml}
    <splashScreens>
       <image>assets/splash-768x1280.png</image>
       <image>assets/splash-720x720.png</image>
    </splashScreens>
{code}

Also we have to Replace PlayBook images (splash-600x1024.png) with BB10 sizes

BB10 app icon 114*114
https://developer.blackberry.com/devzone/design/bb10/application_icons.html

Thanks a lot
fields.summary: BlackBerry: Q10 splash screen not supported
fields.environment:
Mac OS 10.9.1
Momentics 2 with BB 10.2.0
